text: Hi Everyone , I’m a rookie in Solidity and actually following a bootcamp to become a blockchain developer. I’m self-taught , and involved in projects to build in Blockchain as the Loot gamin , also in the hackathon ETHOnline building protocols /coding . I’m in freelance and looking forward for a job / missions . Don’t hesitate to contact me :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey everyone,

The Team at <https://www.lean-labs.com/|Lean Labs> and <https://www.sprocketrocket.co/|Sprocket Rocket> is hiring a front-end developer.

You can find the <https://www.lean-labs.com/careers/front-end-developer-0?utm_campaign=Job%20Applicant&utm_source=Slack&utm_medium=HS%20Dev%20Slack%20Posting|description and application details here>.

Feel free to ask any questions.
